lines.gurmukhi: kwlr mYN boey bIj aupjY n pwn Dwn; Kyq mY fwry su qwN qy AiDk Anwj hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as seed sown in saline land does not grow even a leaf, but if this land is treated with gypsum salt, it gives much yield.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: k`lrI DrqI ivc Dwnwˆ dw bIj bIjIey qwˆ p`qw BI nhIˆ Pu`tdw, pr jy auho Sorw Kyq ivc pweIey qwˆ aus qoˆ Anwj bhuq ho jwˆdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: kwlr sY krq sbwr jm sw aUsu qO; pwvk pRsMg qp qyj auprwj hY [

Unknown.translation: Saline, when mixed with water vaporises and then condenses, but when brought near fire produces a blast.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: jd k`lr Sory nwl pwxI myldy hn qwˆ auh BwP nUM jmw idMdw hY, pr auho Sorw A`g dw sMg pw ky Bbwkw pY krdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jsq sMXukq hÍY imlq hY sIq jl; Acvq swNiq suK iqRKw BRm Bwj hY [

Unknown.translation: The same saline salt when brought in contact with zinc container cools the water that gives peace and comfort when drunk. It satiates the craving and thirst.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: auho Sorw ijsq dI surwhI nwl jdoˆ joVIdw hY qwˆ TMFw jl pRwpq huMdw hY, ijs nUM pIˆidAwˆ SwˆqI qy suK huMdw hY, qy qRyh dw Brm dUr ho jwˆdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy Awqmw Acyq sMgq suBwv hyq; sikq sikq gq isv isv swj hY [598[

Unknown.translation: Similarly, a human soul under the influence of good and bad company and developing love and attachment with consciousless maya becomes consciousless. And by loving the conscious benevolent Lord, it also becomes benevolent and conscientious.  (598)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqvyˆ Awqmw dw suBwv mwieAw dI sMgq nwl mwieAw vrgw Acyq jVH rUp ho jwˆdw hY qy kilAwn srUp dI pRIq nwl kilAwn srUp bx jwˆdw hY ]598]
